It takes a lot of guts to fight Killian, the god of terror.

Fear is the worst enemy of all, you know. It poisons you from the inside. The only way to overcome fear is expose yourself to it.

You need a trace of terror, the essence of an extremely frightening experience."What's it look like?"

It looks a little different to everyone. That's the point, .

The easiest way to get a trace of terror is to extract it from a corpse that saw its death coming...and feared it. For once, I suppose we should be glad that this place is crawling with the undead, eh?

Bring me Traces of Fear, and I'll brew a potion of will for you.

Good, this is enough.

I'll formulate a potion of will for you. That wasn't so scary, was it?

You can find traces of terror from the undead around here.

If you bring me enough traces of terror, I can formulate a potion of will for you.
